item.title: ニュージーランドの公共ラジオが、ウェブサイト上のロイターの記事16本が「親クレムリンのゴミ」を含むように改変されていたことを発見し、謝罪し、ジャーナリストを停職にした（Nick Perry/Associated Press）。
item.description:
Nick Perry / Associated Press:
New Zealand's public radio apologizes and suspends a journalist after finding 16 Reuters stories on its website were altered to include “pro-Kremlin garbage”  —  The head of New Zealand's public radio station apologized Monday for publishing “pro-Kremlin garbage” …

item.title: ソースはこちらFox Newsがタッカー・カールソンにTwitter番組に関する中止勧告書を送付、同ネットワークはカールソンの契約は2024年12月31日までと発表（Mike Allen/Axios)
item.description:
Mike Allen / Axios:
Source: Fox News sends Tucker Carlson a cease and desist letter over his Twitter show; the network says Carlson's contract runs through December 31, 2024  —  Fox News has sent a “cease and desist” letter to Tucker Carlson as he ramps up a competing series on Twitter that drew …

item.title: メッセージのことです：ワーナーメディアは、CNNと当時のニューヨーク州知事アンドリュー・クオモ（クリス・クオモの弟）との関係を利用して、自社の商業的利益を促進した（Max Tani/Semafor)
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Messages: WarnerMedia used CNN's relationship with then New York Governor Andrew Cuomo, brother of Chris Cuomo, to advance its commercial interests  —  The Scoop  —  CNN and its parent company Warner Bros. Discovery, reeling from firing CEO Chris Licht last week, are now facing a new, high-stakes drama.

item.title: SFやファンタジーの出版社は、業界におけるAIツールの役割や、AIが生成したコンテンツが一般化することによる信頼の危機にどう対処しているのか（Mia Sato/The Verge）
item.description:
Mia Sato / The Verge:
How science fiction and fantasy publishers are dealing with AI tools' role in the industry and with the trust crisis due to AI-generated content becoming common  —  Science fiction and fantasy authors are struggling with AI-generated media — and formulating strategies to deal with it.

item.title: Telegraphの親会社であるB.UKが管財人になり、オークションにかけられることになったので、買い手の候補と、そのニュースについてスタッフの間で共有された最初の楽観主義について見てみよう（Mark Sweney/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Mark Sweney / The Guardian:
With Telegraph's parent company B.UK in receivership and set for auction, a look at potential buyers and initial optimism shared among its staff about the news  —  With a sell-off looming for the newspapers, several tycoons and groups look to have the money, and the motivation, to take over

item.title: 調査結果日本人の75％がフェイクニュースに遭遇、事実確認の方法を知っているのは19％、アジア主要国で最低の比率、ベトナムが81％でトップ（日経アジア）
item.description:
Nikkei Asia:
Survey: 75% of Japanese people encounter fake news but only 19% know how to fact-check it, the lowest ratio among major Asian countries; Vietnam led at 81%  —  Study shows only one in five Japanese know how to fact-check information  —  TOKYO — Accurate news is the bedrock of democracy …

item.title: カリフォルニアを拠点とする非営利団体CatchLightが資金提供した報道について、3人のフォトジャーナリストが語る（Amaris Castillo/Poynter）
item.description:
Amaris Castillo / Poynter:
Three photojournalists talk about their reporting funded by California-based nonprofit CatchLight, which supports visual journalists in underrepresented markets  —  ‘I thought and I understood that it was very likely that I would never be part of a newsroom again, because those positions are so rare ...’

item.title: セサミワークショップとフレッド・ロジャース・プロダクションは、子ども向け番組におけるインクルージョンと教育の価値観を、しばしば新しい手段で適用し続けている（Abbey White/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Abbey White / The Hollywood Reporter:
How Sesame Workshop and Fred Rogers Productions continue to apply their values for inclusion and education in children's programming, often through new avenues  —  Nearly six decades after they premiered, ‘Sesame Street’ and ‘Mister Rogers’ Neighborhood' continue to inspire kids' programming …

item.title: A.G.サルツバーガーとのQ&A「独立」ジャーナリズム、NYTの財務的復活、オピニオンページへの批判、トランプ報道、トランス問題など（David Remnick/New Yorker)
item.description:
David Remnick / New Yorker:
Q&A with A.G. Sulzberger on “independent” journalism, the NYT's financial comeback, criticisms of its op-ed page, its coverage of Trump, trans issues, and more  —  The paper's publisher discusses bias in reporting, the Times' financial comeback, and criticisms of its coverage of Trump …

item.title: チャック・トッドにMeet the Pressを降板する理由、ドキュメンタリーとドキュドラマの計画、反ユダヤ主義の台頭などについてインタビュー（Matthew Kassel/Jewish Insider）。
item.description:
Matthew Kassel / Jewish Insider:
An interview with Chuck Todd on his reasons for stepping down from Meet the Press, his plans for docuseries and docudramas, the rise of antisemitism, and more  —  The outgoing ‘Meet the Press’ host on the state of journalism, the Trump era, rising antisemitism and the long-form documentary projects he's pitching

item.title: 技術系記者が2023年の世界大百科事典印刷セットを購入した理由を語る：ノスタルジー、永続性、AIや人間の改ざん、リンク腐敗、ステルス編集がないこと（Benj Edwards/Ars Technica）
item.description:
Benj Edwards / Ars Technica:
A tech reporter on why he bought a 2023 World Book Encyclopedia printed set: nostalgia, permanence, and no AI or human tampering, link rot, or stealth edits  —  The still-updated World Book Encyclopedia is my antidote to the information apocalypse.  —  These days, many of us live online …

item.title: ロシアのワーグナー・グループが製作したハリウッドスタイルのプロパガンダ映画を紹介。プーチンは、西洋文化の支配に対抗して戦争を売り込もうとしている。（Scott Johnson/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Scott Johnson / The Hollywood Reporter:
A look at the Hollywood-style propaganda films made by Russia's Wagner Group, a part of Putin's efforts to sell his war by countering Western cultural dominance  —  Russia's multi-tentacled Wagner Group is not just sending mercenaries to the Ukrainian front lines.

item.title: 情報源: D'Ameliosは、$20Mを用意した音楽スタートアップFirebirdと提携し、他のソーシャルメディアインフルエンサーを管理する会社DamGood Mgmtを設立（Anne Steele/Wall Street Journal)
item.description:
Anne Steele / Wall Street Journal:
Sources: the D'Amelios partner with music startup Firebird, which has set aside $20M, to form DamGood Mgmt, a company to manage other social media influencers  —  Siblings Charli and Dixie D'Amelio and their parents form new company to manage other social-media stars

item.title: Reddit、2つの新しい広告プロダクトを発表：ブランドの製品ページにユーザーを送るコールトゥアクションボタンを持つProduct Adsと、Contextual Keyword Targeting (Nicola Agius/Search Engine Land)。
item.description:
Nicola Agius / Search Engine Land:
Reddit launches two new ad products: Product Ads, which have call-to-action buttons that send users to a brand's product page, and Contextual Keyword Targeting  —  Reddit launched two new ad products today - Contextual Keyword Targeting and Product Ads.  The new features have been rolled …

item.title: ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙、金融担当のチャールズ・フォレル氏を副編集長に任命、フォレル氏は2002年にインターンとして入社 (Chris Roush/Talking Biz News)
item.description:
Chris Roush / Talking Biz News:
The Wall Street Journal names finance editor Charles Forelle as its deputy editor-in-chief; Forelle joined the outlet in 2002 as an intern  —  Wall Street Journal editor in chief Emma Tucker sent out the following on Friday:  —  Dear all,  —  Charles Forelle is named Deputy Editor in Chief of The Wall Street Journal.
